TDFC London











The all T1 London Futsal team


Find Out More

Founded in 2019, we are an all T1 futsal team!

A variety of ages, but the sharing of a passion for football and living with T1!

What We Offer

Ethos

What We Offer

Support

T1 is a relentless condition, we offer voluntary peer support.

Development

We're here to help you develop your Futsal skills to play in a compettitve league in London.

Fun whilst exercising.

You don't have to be the best baller. Just have the will to kick a ball and have a good time.

Question

I mustache you a question...
